name: User
description: The AWS::IAM::User type creates a user.

properties.name: Groups
properties.description: A name of a group to which you want to add the user.

properties.name: LoginProfile
properties.description: Creates a login profile so that the user can access the AWS Management Console.

properties.name: ManagedPolicyArns
properties.description: One or more managed policy ARNs to attach to this user.

properties.name: Path
properties.description: The path for the user name. For more information about paths, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

properties.name: Policies
properties.description: The policies to associate with this user. For information about policies, see Overview of Policies in [Using IAM].

attributes.name: Arn
attributes.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified AWS::IAM::User resource. For example: arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/mystack-myuser-1CCXAFG2H2U4D.
